description.value:
Level: 2
Category: Other
Time: 15 minutes
Component Cost: 25 gp
Market Price: 100 gp
Key Skill: Heal or Nature (no check)

An eyedropper holds a few drops of a dark purple fluid. When the fluid is placed in your eyes, you find you can see clearly in dim light.

Panther Tears
Level 2 Uncommon

For a moment your vision is blurry, but when you blink away the excess liquid, you see clearly through the gloom.

Price: 25 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable): Minor Action. You gain low-light vision until the end of your next turn.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 102.
